amendment.description: To direct the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to establish a pilot program to provide regulatory compliance assistance to small business concerns, and for other purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 128 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 128 proposed by Senator Kennedy for Senator Kerry to Amendment SA 100. (consideration: CR S1042) To direct the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to establish a pilot program to provide regulatory compliance assistance to small business concerns, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 128 proposed by Senator Kennedy for Senator Kerry to Amendment SA 100.
